template<class ComponentType , typename ... Args>
void India::Object::AddComponent ( Args &&...  args)

◆ Draw()

virtual void India::Object::Draw ( const Graphics2D &  g) const
pure virtual

Template method which describes how to draw a concrete object.

Implemented in India::GuiObject, India::GameObject, India::LevelText, and India::LevelObject.

◆ DrawComponent()

void India::Object::DrawComponent ( const Graphics2D &  g) const
virtualnoexcept

Originally calls the Draw() function, but can be extended with more functions. Make sure to call the base function when overriding.

Reimplemented in India::GuiObject.

template<class ComponentType >
ComponentType & India::Object::GetComponent

Adds the component to the object, if the object does not have a component of the same type already.

Returns the specified component of the object if available.

◆ HasComponents()

template<class ComponentType , typename ... OtherTypes>
bool India::Object::HasComponents
noexcept

Returns true if this Object has all specified types of Components.

Returns true if the object has all specified components Returns false if any of the specified components are not found in the object
